name: languages spoken, written or signed
compound: [OBJ_LABEL] is a language and [SUBJ_LABEL] used to communicate in it.
compound-new: [OBJ_LABEL] is a language and it is the language [SUBJ_LABEL] used to communicate in it.
complex: [OBJ_LABEL] is the language that [SUBJ_LABEL] used to communicate in.
compound-complex: [OBJ_LABEL] is a language which many people used to communicate in and [SUBJ_LABEL] did exactly that.
